parameters.name: LpComponents
parameters.description: Array of components being checked for interference

parameters.name: CoincidentInterference
parameters.description: True to check for coincident interference, false to not

parameters.name: PComp
parameters.description: Array of components where interference has been found

parameters.name: PFace
parameters.description: Array of faces where interference has been found

title: IAssemblyDoc.IToolsCheckInterference3
signature:
void IToolsCheckInterference3( 
   System.Int32
NumComponents
,
   ref Component2
LpComponents
,
   System.Boolean
CoincidentInterference
,
   out System.Object
PComp
,
   out System.Object
PFace
)

parameters.name: LpComponents
parameters.description: Array of components being checked for interference

parameters.name: CoincidentInterference
parameters.description: True to check for coincident interference, false to not

parameters.name: PComp
parameters.description: Array of components where interference has been found

parameters.name: PFace
parameters.description: Array of faces where interference has been found

remarks:
This method returns:
an empty array of faces for components that have coincident faces that touch.
an array of components for components that touch.
For each face that intersects, there is a corresponding component.
